description:
Obtain fixel-fixel correpondence between a subject fixel image and a template fixel mask.

It is assumed that the subject image has already been spatially normalised and is aligned with the template. The output fixel image will have the same fixels (and directions) of the template.

References:

angle.title: angle
angle.description: the max angle threshold for computing inter-subject fixel correspondence (Default: 45 degrees)

quiet.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.
